product_name: Klean Kanteen Wide Mouth Cafe Cap
long_description: Turn your Klean Kanteen(R) water bottle into a travel-friendly container with the wide mouth Cafe Cap so you don't have to leave your beverage behind when you walk out the door. BPA-free polypropylene cap is easy to grip and seals tightly; converts your bottle into a splashproof to-go mug. Dishwasher safe and with only one moving part, the Klean Kanteen Cafe Cap is a cinch to clean. Cap is compatible with all wide, insulated and Kid Kanteen(R) bottles (not included). Please note this cap is not leakproof.
short_description: Turn your Klean Kanteen(R) water bottle into a travel-friendly container with the wide mouth Cafe Cap so you don't have to leave your beverage behind when you walk out the door.
